name: FancyCellar - 品庄
overview:
FancyCellar - 品庄 We give to all epicureans insider access to the rarest wines at unrivaled prices.

FancyCellar is an invitation-only website that connects its members with exclusive, limited-time opportunities to purchase directly from wineries, gourmet-food producers and other makers of artisanal goods. Each product or experience featured on FancyCellar is individually evaluated for quality by FancyCellar’s team of experts. Besides, FancyCellar - 品庄 provides his members cutting-edge e-learning content and is the home of one of the largest online wine community in Asia.

FancyCellar is headquartered in Shanghai. For more information or to request an invitation for membership, visit http://www.FancyCellar.com.

offices.address1: KYMS Center 126 Xujiahui Road – Luwan / Xintiandi CBD
